    • 方法详细资料

      • getstarttime

        public void getstarttime()
        get the start time when software start

      • setstarttime

        public void setstarttime(int hh,
                         int mm)
        set the start time manually
        参数:
        hh - hour
        mm - minite

      • getnowtime

        public time getnowtime(time starttime)
        get now time through calculate the start time
        参数:
        starttime - start time
        返回:
        now time

      • changestring

        public static time changestring(java.lang.String tt)
        change input String tt to object time
        参数:
        tt - String need to change(must in type "HH:mm")
        返回:
        object time representative input string tt

      • istime

        public static boolean istime(java.lang.String t)
        judge input t whether obey the type ("HH:mm")
        参数:
        t - a time object
        返回:
        true or false

      • isint

        public boolean isint(java.lang.String a)
        judge input a whether a number
        参数:
        a - string need to be judged
        返回:
        true or false

      • setflag

        public void setflag()
        complement the time accurance flag

      • getlocation

        public int getlocation(train t)
        get the train location now
        参数:
        t - train want to get its location
        返回:
        a location flag in type int

      • getnextstation

        public int getnextstation(train t)
        get next station in a running train
        参数:
        t - a train want to get its next station
        返回:
        a station flag in tyoe int

      • getnexttime

        public int getnexttime(train t)
        get next reaching station time
        参数:
        t - the train want to get the time
        返回:
        a time flag in tyoe int

      • checktt

        public static boolean checktt(java.util.ArrayList<time> tt)
        check the input timelist whether equal to a exist one
        参数:
        tt - a timelist need to check
        返回:
        true or false
